Release Notes:

The Hazards of Love' is an hour long 'rock opera' if
you will, an album-long narrative with a denser
sound and more guitars that tells the forlorn tale
of a woman named Margaret. The album solidifies The
Decemberists' standing as one of the most innovative
creative forces in music today. They will debut the
album live in its entirely at SXSW in March.
Lavender Diamond's Becky Stark and My Brightest
Diamond's Shara Worden deliver the lead vocals for
the female characters, while My Morning Jacket's Jim
James, Robyn Hitchcock and the Spinanes' Rebecca
Gates appear in supporting roles.
